about_the_game:
A once peaceful and quiet city is now invaded with crime. As mafia took control over everything, all the citizens have abandoned their homes and moved out in search of better life. Now armed robbers and mobster are walking around the city streets and squares, looting shops, destroying property and attacking remaining citizens.

With all the police fleeing the city and no one to protect the order, mafia bosses have even captured the top secret laboratories and released dangerous mutated creatures to the streets!

Highlights:

- 10 locations, over 100 levels
- more than 20 enemies types, each with its unique abilities
- 3 unique bosses
- 10 weapon types to choose from
- 9 talents to evolve
- 8 mighty power-ups to pick up on levels

You are the last one of the remaining police officers, a cop who is not afraid to face the mafia with all its goons, mobsters and robbers, you choose to stay and fight the evil!

The cop is largely outnumbered by the enemies force as mafia keeps recruiting more and more new gangsters every day. To be able to stand a chance against large numbers of robbers, mobsters and mutated beasts you need to be smart and fast. Don't ever stand still in one place, always keep moving, take cover behind the street objects and wait for the right moment to counter attack your enemies. Only after the last bandit is down you may walk peaceful around and collect your reward.

There are also lots of weapon power-ups during the game, that will make you a much more efficient shooter - use rocket and grenade launchers, increase you fire rate, shoot energy balls or numerous projectiles to get several enemies at once! Also don't forget to pick up hearts to restore your health - trust me, you're gonna need a lot of it!

Walk through the city, clear every street, square and block, fight mafia on every inch of the city land and don't leave them a chance to stay and rule here! This city deserves a hero and it's up to you to become one!
